verses.verse: Now the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%>
<S%H2088>"This<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> shall be the <S%H7218>beginning<s%> of <S%H2320>months<s%> for you; it is to be the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> of the <S%H8141>year<s%> to you.

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> 'On the <S%H6218>tenth<s%> of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> they are <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> for themselves, according to their fathers' <S%H1004>households,<s%> a <S%H7716>lamb<s%> for each <S%H1004>household.<s%>

'Now <S%H518>if<s%> the <S%H1004>household<s%> is <S%H4480>too<s%> <S%H4591>small<s%> for a <S%H7716>lamb,<s%> then he and his <S%H7934>neighbor<s%> <S%H7138>nearest<s%> to his <S%H1004>house<s%> are to <S%H3947>take<s%> one according to the <S%H4373>number<s%> of <S%H5315>persons<s%> [in them;] <S%H6310>according<s%> to what <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> should <S%H398>eat,<s%> you are to <S%H3699>divide<s%> the <S%H7716>lamb.<s%>

'Your <S%H7716>lamb<s%> shall be an <S%H8549>unblemished<s%> <S%H2145>male<s%> a <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H1121>old;<s%> you may <S%H3947>take<s%> it from the <S%H3532>sheep<s%> or from the <S%H5795>goats.<s%>

'And you shall <S%H1961>keep<s%> <S%H4931><s%> it <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2088>same<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> then the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H6951>assembly<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> is to <S%H7819>kill<s%> it at <S%H6153>twilight.<s%>

'Moreover, they shall <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> and <S%H5414>put<s%> it on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4201>doorposts<s%> and on the <S%H4947>lintel<s%> of the <S%H1004>houses<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> they <S%H398>eat<s%> it.

'And they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> that [same] <S%H3915>night,<s%> <S%H6748>roasted<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and they shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it with <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread<s%> and <S%H4844>bitter<s%> <S%H4844>herbs.<s%>

'Do not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> of it <S%H4995>raw<s%> or <S%H1310>boiled<s%> at <S%H1310>all<s%> with <S%H4325>water,<s%> but <S%H3588>rather<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H6748>roasted<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> [both] its <S%H7218>head<s%> and its <S%H3767>legs<s%> <S%H5921>along<s%> with its <S%H7130>entrails.<s%>

'And you shall not <S%H3498>leave<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> of it <S%H3498>over<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1242>morning,<s%> but whatever is <S%H3498>left<s%> of it <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1242>morning,<s%> you shall <S%H8313>burn<s%> with <S%H784>fire.<s%>

'Now you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in <S%H3602>this<s%> <S%H3602>manner:<s%> [with] your <S%H4975>loins<s%> <S%H2296>girded,<s%> your <S%H5275>sandals<s%> on your <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and your <S%H4731>staff<s%> in your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it in <S%H2649>haste<s%> – it is the Lord's <S%H6453>Passover.<s%>

'For I will <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> on that <S%H3915>night,<s%> and will <S%H5221>strike<s%> <S%H5221>down<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the first-born in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4480>both<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> and <S%H929>beast;<s%> and against <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> I will <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> – I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'And the <S%H1818>blood<s%> shall be a <S%H226>sign<s%> for you on the <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> you live; and when I <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> I will <S%H6452>pass<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> you, and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5063>plague<s%> will <S%H1961>befall<s%> you to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> [you] when I <S%H5221>strike<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

'Now <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> will be a <S%H2146>memorial<s%> to you, and you shall <S%H2287>celebrate<s%> it [as] a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> you are to <S%H2287>celebrate<s%> it [as] a <S%H5769>permanent<s%> <S%H2708>ordinance.<s%>

<S%H7651>'Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread,<s%> but on the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall <S%H7673>remove<s%> <S%H7603>leaven<s%> from your <S%H1004>houses;<s%> for <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H398>eats<s%> anything <S%H2557>leavened<s%> from the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H5315>person<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

'And on the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> you shall have a <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>assembly,<s%> and [another] <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4744>assembly<s%> on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4399>work<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> shall be <S%H6213>done<s%> on them, <S%H389>except<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> must be <S%H398>eaten<s%> by <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5315>person,<s%> that <S%H905>alone<s%> may be <S%H6213>prepared<s%> by you.

'You shall also <S%H8104>observe<s%> the [Feast of] <S%H4682>Unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>Bread,<s%> for on <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6106>very<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> I <S%H3318>brought<s%> your <S%H6635>hosts<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> therefore you shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations<s%> as a <S%H5769>permanent<s%> <S%H2708>ordinance.<s%>

'In the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>[month,<s%>] on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H2320>month<s%> at <S%H6153>evening,<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the twenty-first <S%H3117>day<s%> of the month at <S%H6153>evening.<s%>

<S%H7651>'Seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> there shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7603>leaven<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> in your <S%H1004>houses;<s%> for <S%H3605>whoever<s%> <S%H398>eats<s%> <S%H9260>what<s%> is <S%H9260>leavened,<s%> that <S%H5315>person<s%> shall be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> from the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> whether [he is] an <S%H1616>alien<s%> or a <S%H249>native<s%> of the <S%H776>land.<s%>
'You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>anything<s%> <S%H9260>leavened;<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H4186>dwellings<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread.<s%>' "

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H4900>"Go<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> for yourselves <S%H6629>lambs<s%> according to your <S%H4940>families,<s%> and <S%H7819>slay<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> [lamb.]

"And you shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H92>bunch<s%> of <S%H231>hyssop<s%> and <S%H2881>dip<s%> it in the <S%H1818>blood<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is in the <S%H9371>basin,<s%> and <S%H5060>apply<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H1818>blood<s%> that is in the <S%H9371>basin<s%> to the <S%H4947>lintel<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4201>doorposts;<s%> and <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H376><s%> of you shall <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>outside<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> of his <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H1242>morning.<s%>

"For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5674>pass<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> to <S%H5062>smite<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians;<s%> and when He <S%H7200>sees<s%> the <S%H1818>blood<s%> on the <S%H4947>lintel<s%> and on the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4201>doorposts,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H6452>pass<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> and will not <S%H5414>allow<s%> the <S%H7843>destroyer<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> in to your <S%H1004>houses<s%> to <S%H5062>smite<s%> [you.]
"And you shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>event<s%> as an <S%H2706>ordinance<s%> for you and your <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H5414>give<s%> you, as He has <S%H1696>promised,<s%> that you shall <S%H8104>observe<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5656>rite.<s%>
"And it will <S%H1961>come<s%> about when your <S%H1121>children<s%> will <S%H559>say<s%> to you, <S%H4100>'What<s%> does <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5656>rite<s%> mean to you?'

that you shall <S%H559>say,<s%> 'It is a <S%H6453>Passover<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H6452>passed<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> the <S%H1004>houses<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> when He <S%H5062>smote<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> but <S%H5337>spared<s%> our <S%H1004>homes.<s%>' "And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H6915>bowed<s%> <S%H6915>low<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped.<s%>

Then the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> and <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H3651>[so;<s%>] <S%H9201>just<s%> as the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> so they <S%H6213>did.<s%>

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about at <S%H2677>midnight<s%> <S%H3915><s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the first-born in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> from the first-born of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> who <S%H3427>sat<s%> on his <S%H3678>throne<s%> to the first-born of the <S%H7628>captive<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was in the <S%H1004>dungeon,<s%> <S%H953><s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the first-born of <S%H929>cattle.<s%>

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> in the <S%H3915>night,<s%> he and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians;<s%> and there was a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6818>cry<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> for <S%H369>there<s%> was <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H369>there<s%> was not someone <S%H4191>dead.<s%>

Then he <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> at <S%H3915>night<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6965>"Rise<s%> up, <S%H3318>get<s%> out from <S%H8432>among<s%> my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> you and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and <S%H1980>go,<s%> <S%H5647>worship<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> as you have <S%H1696>said.<s%>
<S%H3947>"Take<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> your <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and your <S%H1241>herds,<s%> as you have <S%H1696>said,<s%> and <S%H1980>go,<s%> and <S%H1288>bless<s%> me <S%H1571>also.<s%>"

And the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H2388>urged<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> to <S%H7971>send<s%> them out of the <S%H776>land<s%> in <S%H4116>haste,<s%> for they <S%H559>said,<s%> "We shall <S%H3605>all<s%> be <S%H4191>dead.<s%>"

So the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> their <S%H1217>dough<s%> <S%H2962>before<s%> it was <S%H2556>leavened,<s%> [with] their <S%H4863>kneading<s%> <S%H4863>bowls<s%> <S%H9503>bound<s%> up in the <S%H8071>clothes<s%> on their <S%H7926>shoulders.<s%>

Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> had <S%H6213>done<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> for they had <S%H7592>requested<s%> from the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H3627>articles<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H3627>articles<s%> of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H8071>clothing;<s%>

and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> so that they let them have their <S%H7592>request.<s%> Thus they <S%H5337>plundered<s%> the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>

Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H7486>Rameses<s%> to <S%H5523>Succoth,<s%> about <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1397>men<s%> on <S%H7273>foot,<s%> <S%H905>aside<s%> from <S%H2945>children.<s%>

And a <S%H9434>mixed<s%> <S%H7227>multitude<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up with them, along with <S%H6629>flocks<s%> and <S%H1241>herds,<s%> a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3515>large<s%> <S%H3515>number<s%> of <S%H4735>livestock.<s%>

And they <S%H644>baked<s%> the <S%H1217>dough<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H3318>brought<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> into <S%H5692>cakes<s%> of <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H4682>bread.<s%> For it had not <S%H2556>become<s%> <S%H2556>leavened,<s%> <S%H3588>since<s%> they were <S%H1644>driven<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> and <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H4102>delay,<s%> <S%H1571>nor<s%> <S%H3808><s%> had they <S%H6213>prepared<s%> <S%H1571>any<s%> <S%H6720>provisions<s%> for themselves.

Now the <S%H4186>time<s%> that the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> was <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years,<s%> to the <S%H6106>very<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6635>hosts<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3318>went<s%> out from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

It is a <S%H3915>night<s%> to be <S%H8107>observed<s%> for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for having <S%H3318>brought<s%> them out from the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> is for the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> to be <S%H8107>observed<s%> by <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> is the <S%H2708>ordinance<s%> of the <S%H6453>Passover:<s%> <S%H3605>no<s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1121>foreigner<s%> <S%H5236><s%> is to <S%H398>eat<s%> of it;
but <S%H3605>every<s%> man's <S%H5650>slave<s%> <S%H4736>purchased<s%> with <S%H3701>money,<s%> after you have <S%H4135>circumcised<s%> him, <S%H227>then<s%> he may <S%H398>eat<s%> of it.
"A <S%H8453>sojourner<s%> or a <S%H7916>hired<s%> <S%H7916>servant<s%> shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> of it.

"It is to be <S%H398>eaten<s%> in a <S%H259>single<s%> <S%H1004>house;<s%> you are not to <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H4480>any<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H2351>outside<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> are you to <S%H7665>break<s%> any <S%H6106>bone<s%> of it.
<S%H3605>"All<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are to <S%H6213>celebrate<s%> this.
